column5: Fished some shore spots on Long Point Bay with my boss last week and were pleasantly surprised with a few perch to take home. LOTS of throwback small ones, we ended up with 13 'keepers' though I think about 4 of those would be borderline, lol.  Floats & Minnows did the trick.
sounds like a good boss.... takes u fishing ... I wish mine would !
Sweet dude!  Averie and I took a few "keepers" home for a snack last night also... But they were all borderline! lol nice to see you got out bud!
Sweeet!! There's something about bobber fishing that brings out the kid in everyone!  hahaha... Great Job!!
Good way to unwind.... fishing with the boss Thanks for sharing Leechman
